analysis.title: Vulnerability Analysis
analysis.description: Analysis of the vulnerability and assessment of whether and, if so, how problematic the vulnerability is for the product.

cwe.title: Common Weakness Enumeration
cwe.description: The Common Weakness Enumeration (CWE) identifier that represents the type of vulnerability. CWE is a community-developed list of software and hardware weakness types.

desc.title: Vulnerability Description
desc.description: A short summary of the vulnerability and its impact on the product.

reports.title: Vulnerability Reports
reports.description: A list of vulnerability reports, each issues by a reporter.

resolutions.title: Vulnerability Resolutions
resolutions.description: A list of resolutions describing how the vulnerability may be resolved.
